body_html:
Hi, is there anything I can do now to help get this through or do you all still want some more time to think about the batched sparse matrices with the same sparsity pattern?

I'd like to merge this version with GPU support as soon as we've agreed upon the best way to format the data so that people using my qpth library can use PyTorch master for GPU operations. Afterwards can we file another issue for CPU support?

body:
Hi, is there anything I can do now to help get this through or do you all still want some more time to think about the batched sparse matrices with the same sparsity pattern?

I'd like to merge this version with GPU support as soon as we've agreed upon the best way to format the data so that people using my qpth library can use PyTorch master for GPU operations. Afterwards can we file another issue for CPU support?
